feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-13T16:01:21.647057Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;FDA 批准第一种非处方每日口服避孕药</stitle>; <id>;https://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/fda-approves-first-nonprescription -daily-oral-contraceptive</id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T15:01:12.783682Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.fda.gov/news-events/press-announcements/ fda-approves-first-nonprescription-daily-oral-contraceptive"/>; <作者>; <名称>;pg_1234</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pg_1234</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.fda.gov/themes/custom/preview/img/FDA-Social-Graphic.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;美国FDA已批准Opil，这是该国首款非处方每日口服避孕药。这种仅含孕激素的药丸为消费者提供了一种无需处方即可购买口服避孕药的选择。 <a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fda-approves-first-nonprescription-daily-oral-contraceptive" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36709912" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;直接来自 JPEG 的更快神经网络</stitle>; <id>;https://www.uber.com/blog/neural-networks-jpeg/</id>; <更新>; 2023-07-13T15:01:12.946634Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.uber.com/blog/neural-networks-jpeg/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Anon84</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Anon84</uri>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;巴德的最新作品更新：更多功能、语言和国家/地区</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.google/products/bard/google-bard-new-features-update-july-2023/</id>; <updated>;2023- 07-13T15:01:12.950654Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.google/products/bard/google-bard-new-features-update-july-2023/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;quyleanh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=quyleanh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/ai_evergreen_hero.width-1200.format-webp.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 92px;" />;<br />;巴德正在将其可用性扩展到更多国家和语言，其新功能允许用户定制他们的体验、以 40 多种语言进行协作、听取巴德的回应、调整语气和风格响应、固定和重命名对话、将代码导出到 Replit、与其他人共享响应以及在提示中使用图像。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bards-latest-update-more-features-languages -and-countries" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36709895" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;很酷但晦涩难懂的 X11 应用</stitle>; < id>;https://cyber.dabamos.de/unix/x11/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T14:01:12.951812Z</更新>; <link href="https://cyber.dabamos. de/unix/x11/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;RalfWausE</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=RalfWausE</uri>; </author>; <内容类型= "html">;<img src="https://cyber.dabamos.de/unix/x11/3dpong.gif" style="宽度：220px; height: 228px;" />;<br />;X Window 系统的工具小集合，有些比较晦涩难懂。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cool-but-obscure -x11-apps" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36708511" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：开源 IAM Ory Kratos v1 .0 带有密钥、MFA 和多区域</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ory/kratos/releases/tag/v1.0.0</id>; <updated>;2023-07-13T14:01 :12.952833Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/ory/kratos/releases/tag/v1.0.0"/>; <作者>; <name>;gvusfraber</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gvusfraber</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/d527c2c89849d5097c8f5f69662b83b2abb7f2f492cca244805c50310bad91f6/ory/kratos/发布/标签/v1.0.0" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Ory Kratos v1.0 是一个主要版本，它带来了增强功能和修复，以改善用户体验和性能。它引入了新功能，例如支持社交登录和单点登录、多点登录-区域支持，并改进了会话管理。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-open-source-iam-ory-kratos-v1-0-with-passkeys-mfa-and -multi-region" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36708907" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;DSReality：将 DS 游戏变成 3D 图像漂浮在控制器上方</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/zhuowei/DSReality</id>; <updated>;2023-07-13T12:01:12.954034Z</updated>; <link href="https ://github.com/zhuowei/DSReality"/>; <author>; <name>;Philpax</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Philpax</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/704768/247585414-1514c7c8-76b1-4e41-9894-a027b6d35cb0.png" style="width: 220px; height: 102px;" />;<br />;存在内存泄漏问题，导致应用程序在几分钟后崩溃。该应用程序仅适用于 Mario Kart DS 使用的相机位置，并且 ROM 名称被硬编码为“rom” .nds'。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dsreality-turns-a-ds-game-into-a-3d-image-that-floats-above-your-controller" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36707510" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;商业利益向 FCC 申请短波高功率分配</stitle>; <id>; https://www.arrl.org/news/commercial-interests-petition-fcc-for-high-power-allocation-on-shortwave-spectrum</id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T14:01:12.955124Z </更新>; <link href="https://www.arrl.org/news/commercial-interests-petition-fcc-for-high-power-allocation-on-shortwave-spectrum"/>; <作者>; <姓名>;stolenmerch</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=stolenmerch</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www .arrl.org/files/image/About_ARRL/ARRL_logo_with_title.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：102px;" />;<br />;短波现代化联盟已请求 FCC 允许在 HF 2 – 25 MHz 范围内的多个频段上进行数据通信，功率高达 20 KW，包括与业余无线电服务相邻的频段。该团体代表高速股票交易利益。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#commercial-interests-petition-fcc-for-high-power-allocation-on-shortwave" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36708723" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;设计死了吗？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.martinfowler。 com/articles/designDead.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T15:01:12.956213Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.martinfowler.com/articles/designDead.html"/ >; <author>; <name>;nickwritesit</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nickwritesit</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://martinfowler.com/logo-sq.png”样式=“宽度：220px； height: 220px;" />;<br />;极限编程 (XP) 通过拒绝前期设计中的大量工作并支持更具进化性的方法来挑战有关软件开发的常见假设。XP 涉及大量设计，但以不同的方式进行比已建立的软件流程更先进的方式。它通过实践使进化设计的概念焕发活力，使进化成为可行的设计策略。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#is-design-dead" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36709593" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ Entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;2023 年的许多计划登月</stitle>; <id>;https:// spectrum.ieee.org/lunar-landing</id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T12:01:12.957130Z</更新>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee.org/lunar-landing"/ >; <作者>; <名称>;rbanffy</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rbanffy</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/a-large-rocket-take-off-with-fire-and-smoke-coming-out-the-bottom.jpg?id=34309064&width=1200&height=900 “样式=”宽度：220px;高度：165px;" />;<br />;自从阿波罗计划取得技术胜利以来，安全登陆月球的几率实际上已经下降。计划在 2023 年底之前再进行五次登陆尝试，包括来自印度、美国、和日本。这些任务中的每一个都落后于计划，并且在登陆月球方面面临挑战。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-many-planned-moon-landings-of-2023"目标="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36707773" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在互联网档案馆下载 6,800 多个乐高套件的说明</stitle>; <id>;https://www.openculture.com/2023/07/download-instructions-for-more-than-6800-lego-kits-at-the-internet-archive.html</id>; <更新>;2023 -07-13T10:01:12.958182Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.openculture.com/2023/07/download-instructions-for-more-than-6800-lego-kits-at- the-internet-archive.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rcarmo</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rcarmo</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://cdn8.openculture.com/2023/07/12222411/colosseumlego-1024x589.png" style="宽度：220px;高度：127px;" />;<br />;互联网档案馆收集了 6,800 多种不同套装的数字化乐高拼搭说明，其中包括乐高雪佛兰科迈罗 Z28 和乐高国际空间站等流行版本。乐高套装已被主要考虑儿童玩具，但该公司还发布了面向成人的模型，如罗马斗兽场和所罗门·R·古根海姆博物馆。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#download-instructions-for-more-than- 6800-lego-kits-at-the-internet-archive" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36706757" target= "_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;创始人加密货币贷款机构摄氏度网络被捕，被指控欺诈</stitle>; <id>;https://www.reuters.com/markets/us-sec-sues-celsius-network-its-Founder-2023-07-13/< /id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T15:17:12.959274Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.reuters.com/markets/us-sec-sues-celsius-network-its-Founder -2023-07-13/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;caust1c </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=caust1c</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://cloudfront-us-east-2.images.arcpublishing.com/reuters/KCDF6GNAMFPXNODP6TGEEXZPOU.jpg" style="宽度：220px;身高：147px;" />;<br />;纽约的一名美国检察官周四上午表示，破产的加密货币贷款公司摄氏度网络的创始人兼前首席执行官亚历克斯·马辛斯基 (Alex Mashinsky) 被捕并被指控犯有欺诈罪，三个联邦监管机构对他提起诉讼和他的公司。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#Founder-of-crypto-lender-celsius-network-arrested-charged-with-fraud" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36710558" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;税务准备公司与 Meta 共享有关纳税人的“极其敏感”数据</stitle>; <id>;https://apnews .com/article/irs-taxpayer-tax-preparation-meta-congress-9315cfca7a0942ab89f765d183fbf822</id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T13:01:12.960213Z</更新>; <link href="https://apnews. com/article/irs-taxpayer-tax-preparation-meta-congress-9315cfca7a0942ab89f765d183fbf822"/>; <作者>; <名称>;super humanuser </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=super humanuser< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://dims.apnews.com/dims4/default/3e092bd/2147483647/strip/true/crop/6000x3372+0+314/调整大小/500x281!/quality/90/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.apnews.com%2Ffe%2Ffc%2F3134df1d3f678cb5ff87c2dadf6d%2Fb124bba4d44b42bfbf8670c8a9374b3d" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;三大报税公司 H&R Block、TaxAct 和 TaxSlayer 在至少两年的时间内与 Facebook 母公司 Meta 共享了敏感的纳税人信息。Meta 使用了此信息用于定向广告并训练其算法的数据。国会民主党人呼吁联邦机构进行调查，并可能对税务公司和 Meta 采取法律行动。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tax-prep -firms-shared-extraordinarily-sensitive-data-about-taxpayers-with-meta" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =36707990" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= "text">;CWE 最危险的软件弱点</stitle>; <id>;https://cwe.mitre.org/top25/index.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T11:01:12.962184Z< /updated>; <link href="https://cwe.mitre.org/top25/index.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;dlor</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=dlor</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cwe.mitre.org/images/cwe_top_25_logo_white.png" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;CWE 在漏洞暴露对话中变得越来越普遍，因为社区希望避免可能成为漏洞的根本原因。在 2023 年整个夏季，将会有文章和信息来帮助理解和使用更有效地提高 CWE Top 25 的排名。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cwe-top-most-dangerous-software-weaknesses" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36707321" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Rust 1.71.0</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.rust-lang.org/2023/07/13/Rust -1.71.0.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T15:01:12.963306Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.rust-lang.org/2023/07/13/ Rust-1.71.0.html"/>; <author>; <name>;mbStavola</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mbStavola</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://www.rust-lang.org/static/images/rust-social-wide.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Rust 团队发布了编程语言 1.71.0 版本。该版本包含支持嵌入 Natviz 描述和 GDB 脚本、Windows 平台上的动态库支持以及绑定等新功能按序数转换为符号。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rust-1-71-0" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:// /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36709361" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Xbox360 –>; Windows 可执行转换器 (2017)</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/rexdex/recompiler</id>; <更新>;2023- 07-13T06:01:12.964435Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/rexdex/recompiler"/>; <author>; <name>;taspeotis</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=taspeotis</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rexdex/recompiler/master/_images/xbox_remcompiler .jpg" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 130px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了通过克服不同的CPU、内存布局、加密的可执行映像和过时的GPU架构等技术困难，在PC上运行Xbox360游戏的可能性。作者解释了运行Xbox360游戏的步骤将 Xbox360 可执行文件转换为 x86-64 代码，并提供反汇编过程的简要概述。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#xbox360-windows-executable-converter-2017" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36705223" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;比 Wi-Fi 快 100 倍：发布基于光的网络标准</stitle>; <id>;https ://www.tomshardware.com/news/li-fi-standard-released</id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T12:01:12.965359Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.tomshardware.com/news/li-fi-standard-released" tomshardware.com/news/li-fi-standard-released"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rbanffy</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rbanffy</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/E93zT7HakCqciBbc75KeM4-320-80.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;电气和电子工程师协会 (IEEE) 发布了基于光的无线通信的 802.11bb 标准，称为 Li-Fi。Li-Fi 支持者强调了诸如更快、更稳定等优点。与 Wi-Fi 和 5G 相比，无线通信更可靠，安全性更高。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#100x-faster-than-wi-fi-light-based-networking-standard-released " target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36707789" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</ content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人们帮助维吾尔儿童在土耳其努力建立新生活</stitle >; <id>;https://thechinaproject.com/2023/07/13/the-people-helping-uyghur-children-struggling-to-build-new-lives-in-turkey/</id>; <更新>;2023 -07-13T14:01:12.966325Z</更新>; <link href="https://thechinaproject.com/2023/07/13/the-people-helping-uyghur-children-struggling-to-build-new- lives-in-turkey/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;gsky </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gsky</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型= "html">;<img src="https://thechinaproject.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/image1-2.png" style="width: 220px;身高：294px;" />;<br />;阿卜杜塞米·霍顿在伊斯坦布尔经营一家旅馆，为陷入吸毒和酗酒的维吾尔男孩和年轻人提供庇护和支持。他致力于帮助他们，因为他了解他们的挣扎，我自己也经历过类似的困难。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#people-helping-uyghur-children-struggling-to-build-new-lives-in-turkey" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36709258" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;带压缩器的无参数分类方法</stitle>; <id>;https://aclanthology。 org/2023.findings-acl.426/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T12:01:12.967259Z</更新>; <link href="https://aclanthology.org/2023.findings-acl. 426/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;danielam</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=danielam</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://aclanthology.org/thumb/2023.findings-acl.426.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Zhiying Jiang、Matthew Yang、Mikhail Tsirlin、Raphael Tang、Yiqin Dai 和 Jimmy Lin。2023。“低资源”文本分类：一种使用压缩器的无参数分类方法。In计算语言学协会的调查结果：ACL 2023，第 6810–6828 页，加拿大多伦多。计算语言学协会。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-parameter-free-classification-method -with-compressors" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36707509" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;迪士尼、Netflix 等正在对抗 FTC 的“点击取消提案</stitle>; <id>;https://www.businessinsider.com/hollywood-streamers-oppose-ftc-proposal-regulation-click-to-cancel-subscription-2023-7</id>; <已更新>;2023-07-13T08:01:12.968277Z</已更新>; <link href="https://www.businessinsider.com/hollywood-streamers-oppose-ftc-proposal-regulation-click-to-cancel-subscription -2023-7"/>; <作者>; <名称>;isaacfrond </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=isaacfrond</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://i.insider.com/647c949240bf000019fa23ad?width=700" style="宽度：220px;高度：165px;" />;<br />;包括迪士尼和 Netflix 在内的媒体和娱乐巨头正在反对联邦贸易委员会的“点击取消”提案，该提案将使人们更容易取消流媒体和其他服务。拟议的法规旨在解决服务易于注册但难以取消的问题。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#disney-netflix-and-more-are-fighting-ftc- s-click-to-cancel-proposal" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36706138" target="_blank">; [comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Dt：鸭胶带你的 Unix 管道</stitle>; <id>;https://dt.plumbing/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-13T07:01:12.969355Z</updated>; <link href="https://dt.管道/“/>; <作者>; <名称>;signa11 </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </作者>; <content type =“html”>; dt 是一种实用程序和编程语言，旨在实现符合人体工程学的 shell 内执行。它旨在补充 awk、sed、xargs 和 shell 内置工具等其他工具，并在 BSD 3-Clause 许可下作为开源软件发布。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dt-duck-tape-for-your-unix-pipes" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36705609" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;上周是有记录以来最热的一周 - 这就是我们不断打破记录的原因</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sciencenews.org/article/heat- record-june-july-water-climate</id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T14:01:12.970646Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.sciencenews.org/article/heat-record -june-july-water-climate"/>; <作者>; <名称>;web11</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=web11</uri>; </作者>; <内容type="html">;<img src="https://www.sciencenews.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/071223_no_heat-records_feat-1030x580.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px； ” />;<br />;7月全球平均气温创历史新高，海洋在极端高温中扮演了重要角色。厄尔尼诺气候模式的回归也导致了前所未有的气温。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#last-week-was-the-hottest-ever-recorded-heres-why-we-keep-smashing-records" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36708937" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Gzip 和 KNN 在文本分类方面优于 Transformers</stitle>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rsp1984</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但不要烦恼——让我们再试一次。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gzip-and-knn-outperforms-transformers-on-text-classification" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36707193" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;当工作没有跟着你回家</stitle>; <id>;https://calnewport.com/when-work-didnt-follow-you- home/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T14:01:12.972698Z</更新>; <link href="https://calnewport.com/when-work-didnt-follow-you-home/"/ >; <作者>; <名称>;keyboardJones</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=keyboardJones</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://calnewport.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/author.png”样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：220像素；” />;<br />;在最近的一篇文章中，记者 Dan Kois 讲述了当他的年轻同事发现他在全职工作的同时获得了硕士学位时所表达的震惊。 Kois 继续采访了 X 世代的其他成员，了解他们在 2000 年代初、智能手机或广泛使用的互联网出现之前的生活。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#when-work-didnt-follow-you-home" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36708656" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;一种新的薄透镜望远镜设计可能远远超过詹姆斯·韦伯</stitle>; <id>;https://theconversation.com/a-new-thin-lensed-telescope -design-could-far-surpass-james-webb-goodbye-mirrors-hello-diffractive-lenses-206055</id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T13:01:12.973752Z</更新>; <link href=" https://theconversation.com/a-new-thin-lensed-telescope-design-could-far-surpass-james-webb-goodbye-mirrors-hello-diffractive-lenses-206055"/>; <作者>; <名称>; xoa</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=xoa</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images. theconversation.com/files/536371/original/file-20230707-21-kxopc5.jpeg?ixlib=rb-1.1.0&rect=44%2C44%2C1209%2C599&q=20&auto=format&w=320&fit=clip&dpr=2&usm=12&cs=strip"样式=“宽度：220px； height: 109px;" />;<br />;一个天文学家团队正在开发一种名为鹦鹉螺太空天文台的新型太空望远镜。它采用新颖的薄透镜设计，比传统的镜面更轻、更便宜、更容易生产望远镜。鹦鹉螺望远镜可以收集比詹姆斯·韦伯太空望远镜多一百倍的光，并且有潜力搜索数百颗系外行星，寻找外星生命的迹象。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a -new-thin-lensed-telescope-design-could-far-surpass-james-webb" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=36708327" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;BC 政府在野火疏散中达到了推文限制</stitle>; <id>;https://www.vancouverisawesome.com/highlights/bc-government-hit-tweet-limit-amid-wildfire-evacuations-7268169 </id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T14:01:12.975040Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.vancouverisawesome.com/highlights/bc-government-hit-tweet-limit-amid- wildfire-evacuations-7268169"/>; <作者>; <名称>;nosecreek</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nosecreek</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://www.vmcdn.ca/f/files/glaciermedia/images/climate-enviro-solutions/wildfire/knox-mountain-wildfire.jpg;w=960" style="width ：220像素；高度：164px;" />;<br />;DriveBC 的 Twitter 帐户在周末野火疏散期间分享重要路况信息时达到了推文限制，引发了人们对紧急情况下社交媒体可靠性的担忧。<a href="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/#bc-government-hit-tweet-limit-amid-wildfire-evacuations" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=36708550" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;快速新冠检测漏掉了 90% 的无症状病例</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-02254-9</id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T13:01:12.976291Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-02254-9"/>; <作者>; <名称>;bookofjoe< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.nature. com/w767/magazine-assets/d41586-023-02254-9/d41586-023-02254-9_25585402.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 141px;" />;<br />;在检测有症状的人中，快速抗原检测比无症状的人更可靠，这是一项将家庭快速检测与金标准 PCR 检测进行比较的最大研究发现1。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rapid-covid-tests-miss-90-of-asymptomatic-cases" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36708301" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;《辛普森一家打跑》源代码 (2003)</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Svxy/The-Simpsons-Hit-and-Run </id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T01:01:12.977280Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/Svxy/The-Simpsons-Hit-and-Run"/>; <作者>; <name>;promiseofbeans</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=promiseofbeans</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //opengraph.githubassets.com/bbd311ee00e04f1149b014eb2a241a69440ebd0a3f9dcb508282a5008a8a6481/Svxy/The-Simpsons-Hit-and-Run" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;2003 年被盗的《辛普森一家：打跑》视频游戏源代码已上传到未知论坛。该代码包括用于编译/构建游戏的资源和脚本，但不包括开发团队的私人文档。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#simpsons-hit-and-run-source-code-2003" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36703711" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;大疆无人机救援地图</stitle>; <id>;https://enterprise.dji.com/drone-rescue-map/< /id>; <更新>;2023-07-13T03:01:12.978310Z</更新>; <link href="https://enterprise.dji.com/drone-rescue-map/"/>; <作者>; <名称>; 1970-01-01</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=1970-01-01</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://enterprise.dji.com/drone-rescue-map/Uploads/banner/20191118/5dd25ae567681.jpg" style="宽度：220px;高度：88px;" />;<br />;要包含在这张地图中，无人机必须用于从危险中营救人员。无人机必须是搜索或救援行动的积极组成部分，并在accomplishing the rescue faster, safer, more easily, or more effectively than would have been possible without the drone. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dji-drone-rescue-map" target="_blank ">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36704501" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;VC firms face new scrutiny from LPs</stitle>; <id>;https://www .axios.com/2023/07/13/venture-capital-firm-scrutiny-lp</id>; <updated>;2023-07-13T13:01:12.979447Z</updated>; <link href="https:// www.axios.com/2023/07/13/venture-capital-firm-scrutiny-lp"/>; <author>; <name>;ilamont</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=ilamont</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.axios.com/cPpjyXBeNtsGLccaHUKhvPE3u28=/0x0:1920x1080/1920x1080/2023/07/13/1689240754054 .jpg?w=1920" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Limited partners' grumpiness about VC distributions is not for naught: the industry's cashflow ratio at the end of 2022 (-$48.8 billion) was at its most imbalanced since at least 1998, per new PitchBook data. Investors are giving more scrutiny to VCs in their portfolio who didn't return much cash during 2021's extraordinary market and are now asking for more. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#vc-firms-face-new-scrutiny-from-lps" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36708273" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
